articles.author: Kari Anderson
articles.title: Women's Euro 2025 final: England stuns Spain in penalties to earn second-straight Euro title - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The Lionesses’ incredible luck continued, as Chloe Kelly's decisive penalty kick helped defend its European crown.
articles.content: England came into Sundays UEFA Euro 2025 final looking for revenge and got it. Two years after losing to Spain in the 2023 FIFA Womens World Cup, the Lionesses defeated Spain in penalties, 1(3) - 1(1… [+2043 chars]

articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Greece: Wildfires continue to burn with danger mounting - DW
articles.description: European Union countries, including the Czech Republic and Italy, are sending aircrafts and firefighters to help.
articles.content:
Greece is continuing to battle wildfires that have destroyed homes and sparked evacuations for a second day.
Fires were still raging Sunday morning in the Peloponnese area west of the capital, as we… [+2889 chars]

articles.title: EU regulator green lights injectable HIV drug that could help stop transmission - Jamaica Gleaner
articles.description: LONDON (AP) — The European Medicines Agency has recommended authorizing a twice-yearly injectable drug aimed at preventing HIV, which scientists say could help end the virus’ transmission. In a statement on Friday, the EU drug regulator said its...
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) — The European Medicines Agency has recommended authorizing a twice-yearly injectable drug aimed at preventing HIV, which scientists say could help end the virus’ transmission.
